Title: Enacts the "fast fashion waste responsibility act"
Summary: Enacts the "fast fashion waste responsibility act" in relation to extended producer responsibility for textile products.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3413, En Con L; add §97-ccc, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "fast fashion waste responsibility act"
